title: Лучше не бывает
overview: Victoria Chernova successful, happily married, has a son, lives in a big house in abundance and is the object of envy for many people around her. But all this "sweet life" comes to an end overnight. One day, after returning home, a loving spouse says that she was Packed and out of the house with the child on all four sides. He fell in love with another woman. Victoria is shocked and horrified by, it is not how to build the future life. But makes a strong character. And Vic decides to make her own way, on their own.
